title: Social Impact Project-Based Mathematics Education Design Using 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Basic Competency in Digital Tool Usage
context.additional_context: In-service professionals require practical approaches to apply mathematics to real workplace problems; project themes must reflect regional/cultural contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical modeling for solving social issues using 3D virtual environment tools.
Learners can iteratively improve project deliverables through collaboration with peers on a collaborative platform.
Learners can present and receive evaluations for project outputs linked to real-world clients.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
